thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Blackhawk Network Holdings To Be Acquired By Silver Lake And P2 Capital Partners For $3.5 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Blackhawk Network Holdings To Be Acquired By Silver Lake And P2 Capital Partners For $3.5 Bln

organizations.name: silver lake and p2 capital partners

text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Blackhawk Network Holdings Inc:
* BLACKHAWK NETWORK HOLDINGS, INC. TO BE ACQUIRED BY SILVER LAKE AND P2 CAPITAL PARTNERS FOR $3.5 BILLION
* BLACKHAWK NETWORK HOLDINGS INC - DEAL FOR $45.25 PER SHARE IN CASH
* BLACKHAWK NETWORK - AGREEMENT HAS FULLY COMMITTED DEBT AND EQUITY FINANCING, INCLUDING AN APPROXIMATELY $1.7 BILLION EQUITY COMMITMENT FROM SILVER LAKE
* BLACKHAWK NETWORK HOLDINGS INC - P2 CAPITAL PARTNERS HAS COMMITTED TO VOTE IN FAVOR OF PROPOSED TRANSACTION
* BLACKHAWK-DEAL PERMITS COâ€˜S BOARD, ADVISORS TO SOLICIT, RECEIVE, EVALUATE, ENTER INTO NEGOTIATIONS WITH RESPECT TO ALTERNATIVE PROPOSALS THROUGH FEB 9 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
